chinese: 擊鼓其鏜、踊躍用兵。土國城漕、我獨南行。
english: Hear the roll of our drums!See how we leap about, using our weapons!Those do the fieldwork in the State, or fortify Cao,While we alone march to the south.

chinese: 從孫子仲、平陳與宋。不我以歸、憂心有忡。
english: We followed Sun Zizhong,Peace having been made with Chen and Song;[But] he did not lead us back,And our sorrowful hearts are very sad.

chinese: 爰居爰處、爰喪其馬。于以求之、于林之下。
english: Here we stay, here we stop;Here we lose our horses;And we seek for them,Among the trees of the forest.

chinese: 死生契闊、與子成說。執子之手、與子偕老。
english: For life or for death, however separated,To our wives we pledged our word.We held their hands; -We were to grow old together with them.

chinese: 于嗟闊兮、不我活兮。于嗟洵兮、不我信兮。
english: Alas for our separation!We have no prospect of life.Alas for our stipulation!We cannot make it good.
